data.text:
Donald Trump is robbing the American people in broad daylight.

He took away your health care, his tariffs ripped away affordability, and now he's trying to take 10 BILLION of YOUR tax dollars and put them straight into his own pockets.

His greed and corruption know no bounds. https://t.co/W6zW8FBJxF

What makes Trump happy? Not helping you.

Just power, money, and seeing his name on anything, including a tunnel that would generate billions for our economy. https://t.co/xnwyRiiRPK
Those 1.75 MILLION Americans can no longer get SNAP benefits because this regime slashed food assistance funding. https://t.co/PQhQivIRdf

From illegally attacking ED to undermining students' ability to get ahead, this regime is jeopardizing our children's future.

I met with educators and leaders from across Hawaii to discuss how we can ensure our students have the resources and support they need to thrive amidst https://t.co/1w3w1eMCbT

Trump wants to use funding that would make your life better as leverage to indulge his never-ending need to stroke his own ego.

If you needed anymore proof that Trump won't do anything to help Americans if it doesn't benefit him, his ego, or his pocketbook, here it is: https://t.co/zVsouxPi2p

Trump wants to use funding that would make your life better as leverage to indulge the never-ending need to stroke his own ego.

If you needed anymore proof that Trump won't do anything to help Americans if it doesn't benefit him, his ego, or his pocketbook, here it is: https://t.co/zVsouxPPRX

‘Ōlelo Hawai‘i is one of Hawaii's official languages, but past teaching bans and misguided policies nearly led to its extinction.

Through perseverance, Hawaii's communities have revitalized the language, but we must continue working to preserve and protect it.

E ola mau ka https://t.co/vJAnNXO8gy

This administration's single-minded obsession with deportation is endangering children and breaking up families.

Americans have made it clear they've had enough of this regime's chaos. We must change course. https://t.co/hdE49JNK9W

Dragging people out of their cars.
Arresting people without judicial warrants.
Killing American citizens in the street.

DHS's violent chaos cannot continue.

We need to put common sense guardrails on them NOW. https://t.co/D0Z5SNca7u

This regime's lies will never be able to cover up what we can see with our own eyes.

DHS and ICE are out of control. https://t.co/gJR2bKqkAN
